name: Revolution 60
description: Explore the orbital weapons platform N313 with Holiday and her team of operatives. Along the way you must make choices and live with the outcome.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only) Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A graphics card with shader model 3.0 support. DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: The minimum specs are set by Unreal Engine 3, not GSX. Please follow their guidelines.
